subject: Re: Phonak digial marketing catalogue - log in homepage image

full_threads.body:
Hi Melinda,

Happy Friday!

Thanks for letting us know. We’ve gone ahead and updated the login page - the image box has now been adjusted so its height aligns more evenly with the login form, as requested.

If there’s anything else you’d like us to refine or update, feel free to reach out. Always happy to support however we can!

Morning Adriane,

I have looked at the login page at 100% on my large screen, are we able to make the box a bit bigger so it is even on the bottom of the page with the login form beside it.

Thanks,

Melinda
O'Brien, Melinda reacted to your message:

Hi Melinda,

You're very welcome - glad we could get it set up just the way you wanted!

Feel free to reach out with any other questions or requests - always happy to help however we can.

Hi Melinda,

Just a quick update - the login page has now been updated to follow the screenshot:
  • The new “Speech In Loud Noise” image is positioned on the right side
  • The login form now has a white background
  • The image is centered within the right-hand image area, as requested

If you’d like any further tweaks or refinements, just let me know - always happy to help!

Please update as below screenshot with image to the right and white background behind login form. Image to be centred within the image box on the right.

Thanks,

Melinda

Hi Melinda,

No worries at all - I can definitely make that change for you using the new “Speech In Loud Noise” image.

Just to confirm your layout request:
  • The current setup has the background image covering the entire page.
  • Would you like this updated so that the image appears only in the area to the right of the login form, rather than as a full-page background (attached screenshot on how it will look)?

Once you confirm the layout, I’ll go ahead and publish the changes right away.

Happy to help with anything else you need!

Hi Adriane,

My apologies, I attached the wrong image, please use the one attached. Speech In Loud Noise.

Are we able to right align the image and extend the image on the left under the form box?

Regards,

Melinda

Hi Melinda,

Got your request regarding the Phonak login page. Thanks for sending that new image through!

We’ve gone ahead and updated the homepage background with the file you attached. It’s all processed and live on the site now.
  • You can view the update here: https://phonakmarketing.com.au/

Let us know if you need a hand with anything else. Happy to help!

action.text: Adriane Roa assigned to Adriane Roa

full_threads.body:

Can you please update the Phonak digital marketing catalogue log in homepage image with the attached image.
